turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to place an order for a coffee drink from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem, lets begin your order. Which location of Starbucks would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The location on US HWY 127 in Frankfort, KY 40601

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, got it. What would is your order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like a Cold Brew Coffee.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A Grande.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like any additions added to your Grande Cold Brew Coffee.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Please go ahead with the additions.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like two packets of splenda added.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, anything else.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I also want it to have a light amount of ice in the drink.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay a Grande Cold Brew Coffee with two packets of splenda and light ice. Anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Add vanilla syrup.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it. Any other instructions?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No that will be all.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, your order for a Grande Cold Brew Coffee with two splendas, light ice and vanilla syrup added to it. Is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes it is.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great. Your order will be ready shortly at your local Starbucks. You will have a text message sent to you via text.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.
